summary.title: Photo Sharing Site Threat Model2
summary.description:
The photo-sharing site allows users to upload and retrieve photos via the Internet. On a high level It consists of the following major components and interactions:
1.User (external entity): Accesses site through browser/app.
2.Web Front-End (process): Handles authentication, upload, and retrieval requests.
3.Photo Storage (data store): Stores large photo files.
4.Database (data store): Keeps user and photo metadata.
5.Data Flows: Users upload/download photos (through HTTPS), metadata stored/retrieved from DB, photos stored/retrieved from storage.

Trust Boundaries:
1.Internet (User ↔ Web Front-End)
2. Internal network (Web Front-End ↔ DB/Storage)

data.name: User
data.description: End user using web or mobile client

data.name: Auth Database
data.description: Database – Stores User data, Credentials and User Metadata

data.name: Photo Storage
data.description: High Capacity Disk Array, Stores original photos, thumbnails, and metadata references

data.name: Authentication Result
data.description: Session token or authentication success/failure message

data.name: PhotoUploadRequest
data.description: User requests to upload a photo file

data.name: Photo Retrieval Request
data.description: The requested image file is sent to the user.

data.name: Photo Retrieval Response
data.description: The requested image file is sent to the user.

data.name: auth_request
data.description: Web server queries auth DB to authenticate and authorize requests

data.name: auth_reponse
data.description: Database returns the user record (hashed PW, profile data)

data.name: WriteUserImageFIle
data.description: Application saves the uploaded image bytes to persistent storage

data.name: ReadUserImageFIle
data.description: Application retrieves the image bytes from storage to serve to the user.

data.name: getUserMetadata
data.description: Application retrieves the image bytes from storage to serve to the user."

data.name: paySubscriptionFee
data.description: Pay memebership fee, charges based on disk space.
data.reasonOutOfScope: Reference to question - We also assume that the users pay for the service of storing the photos that the site charges them for; however, you need not worry about the service’s accounting and customer service functions for this question.

data.description: Handles uploads, downloads, auth checks, and serves content
